Title: Provides that historical vehicles manufactured without a front number plate display area need only display such a plate on the rear of the vehicle
Summary: Provides that historical vehicles manufactured without a front number plate display area need only display such a plate on the rear of the vehicle.
LawCode: Amd ยง402, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to authorizing certain historical motor vehicles to display a number plate only on the rear of the vehicle
